The New NullDB Team

âžœ 09 May 2012

A few weeks ago, I announced that I was looking for a new NullDB maintainer. Since then, multiple people have stepped forward and I’m happy to announce the formation of a NullDB core team:

  • Arvind Laxminarayan (github | twitter)
  • Isaac Sanders (github | twitter)
  • Matt Van Horn (github | twitter)
  • Woody Peterson (github)

Please join me in thanking Arvind, Isaac, Matt and Woody for stepping forward and taking over maintainance on this project. I’m confident the project can move forward with a much better direction now that I won’t be the bottleneck anymore!
